COPY .K3.-H- ICABINET.REPRESENTATION OF BRITISH INTERESTS 138 ENEMY COUNTRIES.Note Toy the Secretary.With reference to CP. 189 (39), the attached telegram which, has "been received from His Majesty's Ambassador in Washington is circulated, for the information of the Cabinet, at the request of the Secretary of Stated for Foreign Affairs.(Signed) E.E. BRIDGES,Secretary to the Cabinet.Richmond Terrace,.S.W.1., 2nd September, 1939. 9 t t*J ei 3Decode. The Marquis of Lothian (Washington),1st September, 1939.D. 1.40 p.m. 1st September, 1959.R. 11.00 p.m. 1st September, 1939,No. 404. (R).MOST IMMEDIATE.United States Government agrees to take charge of British'Interests and necessary instructions have been sent to their Embassy in Berlin.
